cause.description:
Shaken baby syndrome is worse than anyone could imagine. Babies, in the hands of parents, relatives and caregivers are being shaken. In 3 seconds a baby's head shakes 13 times. Shaking a baby can cause BLINDNESS, PERMANENT BRAIN DAMAGE, and even DEATH.
1. No baby deserves to be shaken
2. Bring Advocacy to the problem
3. Demand laws to better protect children
cause.mission: Bring a Stop to Shaken Baby Syndrome
cause.name: STOP SBS
